definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Available in selected TV programs in TVB Jade Channel.
sentences.chinese: 于指定的无线电视翡翠台节目提供。

sentences.english: I don't think this show is primetime material.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这算不上是黄金时段的节目。

sentences.english: Design and implementation of a realtime transport cascade multiplexer in SDTV are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 设计并实现了一种可级联的实时多节目复用器。

sentences.english: Station WRC is off the air now. They signed off two hours ago.
sentences.chinese: WRC台现在没节目了，它在两个小时前结束了广播。

sentences.english: She eventually chose a photographer as her date on the show.
sentences.chinese: 最终，马诺在节目里选择了一名摄影师约会。

sentences.english: On a rainy day, Mayor Bloomberg opened the show with these words.
sentences.chinese: 圈”，市长布隆伯格打开这些话的节目。

sentences.english: I can't imagine what it will say.
sentences.chinese: 我无法想象这期节目将要说什么。

sentences.english: A. Which program impresses you the most during the Spring Festival Evening Gala last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨天春晚的哪个节目你印象最深刻？

sentences.english: Remember the terrible accident that opened each episode of the old television show?
sentences.chinese: 想起旧电视节目上展开每段情节的可怕事件了吗？

sentences.english: Hello, and welcome to the Inner Core.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，欢迎收看《人性》节目。

sentences.english: I have made some programmes about child behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 我制作了一些关于儿童行为的节目。

sentences.english: And we had competitions and choir and music every year.
sentences.chinese: 并且我们每年都会有比赛，合唱团和其他音乐节目。

sentences.english: The second program is performing magic, is composed of a small East show.
sentences.chinese: 第二个节目是表演魔术，是由小东表演的。

sentences.english: Choi, hailing from the country that first created this television formula, obviously knows well what audiences expect.
sentences.chinese: 来自此类节目创始国韩国的崔始源深谙观众的期待。

sentences.english: Later she went to work for China Central Television Station, presenting two variety shows.
sentences.chinese: 接着她又在中央电视台工作，主持两档综艺节目。

sentences.english: He wanted to watch soccer game.

definition: to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
China Central Television (CCTV), abbr. for 中國中央電視台|中国中央电视台[Zhong1 guo2 Zhong1 yang1 Dian4 shi4 tai2]
abbr. for 春節聯歡晚會|春节联欢晚会[Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4]
satellite TV (abbr. for 衛星電視|卫星电视[wei4 xing1 dian4 shi4])
online variety show (contracted form of 網絡綜藝節目|网络综艺节目)
regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
The Voice of China, PRC reality talent show
